Title: Requires assisted living facilities to notify residents of changes to medical and support services 180 days prior to such changes taking effect
Summary: Requires assisted living facilities to notify residents of changes to medical and support services 180 days prior to such changes taking effect.
LawCode: Amd ยง4656, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to notification of changes to medical and support services to residents in assisted living facilities
